### Learning Objectives
<p>&nbsp;</p>
* Verify your login to DBMS
<p>&nbsp;</p>
* Username format:
    - 24fa_(your EID)
    - For example: 24fa_jdleonard
<p>&nbsp;</p>
* Password format
    - Shout4_(your EID)_JOY
    - For example: Shout4_jdleonard_JOY
<p>&nbsp;</p>
* Explore the DBMS
    - what can I access?
    - what is inside?
